awd_abstract_narration: In this project in the Theoretical and Computational Chemistry                  Program of the Chemistry Division, Professor Allinger plans to                  extend the capabilities of his renowned computer program to                     enable it to better predict the geometries and properties of a                  wide variety of molecules.                                                                                                                                      The PI will develop the MM3 program so that it will be able to                  handle the common functional groups, delocaized electronic                      systems, and heterocyclic compounds.  A more sophisticated                      formulation of the approach for calculating vibrational spectra                 will be developed as well, and increased use will be made of ab                 initio electronic structure calculations for the                                parametrization of the method.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
